info.name: Replicate integration
info.description:
The Replicate integration app provides a smart picker provider for Whisper translation/transcription and image generation. It also provides a SpeechToText provider, a Text processing provider and an Image generation provider.
## Ethical AI Rating ### Rating: ðŸŸ¡
Positive: * The software for training and inferencing of this model is open source * The trained model is freely available, and thus can be ran on-premises * The training data is freely available, making it possible to check or correct for bias or optimise the performance and CO2 usage.
Negative: * The software for training and inferencing of this model is proprietary, limiting running it locally or training by yourself * The trained model is not freely available, so the model can not be ran on-premises * The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the modelâ€™s performance and CO2 usage.
Learn more about the Nextcloud Ethical AI Rating [in our blog](https://nextcloud.com/blog/nextcloud-ethical-ai-rating/).
info.author: Julien Veyssier
